author: protolambda
content:
About Rayonism, tentative planning, and about the next devnet:
- Next devnet name: **bluerider**
- Today: experimenting with shard-node implementation
- Sunday: I'll publish bluerider network configs and genesis data
- Monday: office hour at 17:00 UTC, we can discuss any testnet questions. *Get started now if you didn't successfully run validators last devnet.*
- Tuesday: setup day, get peers, coordinate etc.
- Wednesday: Genesis (shall we do 12pm (noon) UTC again?)
- Thu: Merge implementers call, discuss merge-transition work and more.
- Fri: office hour at 9:00 UTC, discuss syncing/eth1-polishing implementation approach
- Weekend: we'll keep it running hands-free
- Mon next week: decide on devnet shutdown, and plan final Rayonism longer running testnet, **nocturne**
- Final testnet, runs post-hackathon: same deployment, but time for eth1 to experiment with network layer / sync updates.
- Post-hackathon: shift focus to Altair, London. Some prepare for Merge transition work, and some continue with Sharding.
